system.description: A wall of tangled thorn plants which reaches up to close range from the ground springs from an earthen floor in the area determined by the caster. It may be a flat plane which spans two points up to short range apart, or a circle at the boundaries of close range. Arrows and bolts will be blocked by the plants. Any creature trying to force a way through the thorns will take +6 Health damage, which may be resisted by a Body roll. If the creature is damaged by the thorns then it fails to pass through the wall. The Pass Plant spell works normally on a Wall of Thorns.
